remarks: Alternate way to express that the meet of a lattice hyperplane with an element not under it is covered by the element.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-2013.)
statement:
lhpmcvr2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lhpmcvr2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lhpmcvr2.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
lhpmcvr2.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
lhpmcvr2.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
lhpmcvr2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lhpmcvr2 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ -. X .<_ W ) ) -> E. p e. A ( -. p .<_ W /\ ( p .\/ ( X ./\ W ) ) = X ) ) $.
$d ./\ p $.
$d .<_ p $.
$d A p $.
$d B p $.
$d K p $.
$d W p $.
$d X p $.
